about_the_game:
Almost all game features can be checked in this DEMO.

Main limitation is LOAD/SAVE blocked.
Time limitation for now is 60 minutes - should be really enough to play all TUTORIAL lessons.
I encourage You to play all TUTORIAL lessons.
Thank You
detailed_description:
Almost all game features can be checked in this DEMO.

Main limitation is LOAD/SAVE blocked.
Time limitation for now is 60 minutes - should be really enough to play all TUTORIAL lessons.
I encourage You to play all TUTORIAL lessons.
Thank You
name: Off Course ELEMENTS of SPACE Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10, 11 64BITS
  • Processor: intell, amd
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 720
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10, 11 64BITS
  • Processor: intell, amd
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 1030

short_description: DEMO version: OFF COURSE ELEMENTS of SPACE. 2d top down, pixel art, space ship building game with arcade elements.
